ygData.subject: Re: Grimore pages in Najena (spoiler? not really)
ygData.msgSnippet: I believe they are the spell research components for necromancers, much like our runes. Tandayen, Dark Elf Wizard ... From: Spehar, David J
ygData.messageBody:
I believe they are the spell research components for necromancers, much like
our runes.

Tandayen, Dark Elf Wizard
